Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1797534656959344640/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write Google's Search Ad Copy With Keywords"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1797534656959344640/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE]
Act as Google Search Ads copywriter. 
Here is the list of keywords;
[PROMPT]

First, you have to understand the niche of keywords. Second, understand these conditions: 
1. Capitalize the first letter of each word in response.
2. Divide the response into two sections, Headlines and Descriptions.
3. Write a concise response. 
To the best of your understanding, complete these two tasks:

1. Headlines:
Write 15 sample headlines, the length must be less than 30 characters.
2. Descriptions: 
Write 90-characters-long 4 sample descriptions.
